title: League of legends client stuck at the logo
body:
So party ip weekend came, i was hyped went home to my computer and took a big "fuck you" to the face as my client didnt want to start up AT ALL. As the title says it is just stuck at the logo where it says league of legends. I have thought about switching back to legacy client so i did but there when i press launch i guess it automatically starts up the alpha client or something. SEND HELP I WANT PARTY IP
{{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: I promise the client isn't trying to screw you over, but in actuality it just needs a hand.  Something with your PC is likely blocking the patcher from launching, so it can't show up.  Run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get that fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
